Uses of Class
graphs.Graph

      Methods in graphs that return Graph 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Graph Graph.Barabasi(int n, int d, double g, int dir, int cic)
      It performs the Geographic algorithm to create a random graph.
      Graph Graph.Erdos(int n, int m, int dir, int cic)
      It performs the Erd√∂s-Renyi algorithm to create a random graph.
      Graph Graph.Geo(int n, double r, int dir, int cic)
      It performs the Geographic algorithm to create a random graph.
      Graph Graph.Gilbert(int n, double p, int dir, int cic)
      It performs the Gilbert algorithm to create a random graph.
      Methods in graphs with parameters of type Graph 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Graph.BFS(Graph grafo, Node root)
      It performs the Broad First Search algorithm to the graph.
      void Graph.DFS_I(Graph grafo, Node root)
      * It performs the Deep First Search iterative algorithm to the graph.
      int Graph.DFS_R(Graph grafo, Node root)
      It performs the Deep First Search recursive algorithm to the graph.
      void Graph.Dijkstra(Graph grafo, Node s)
      It performs the Dijkstra algorithm to the graph.
      int Graph.graphDijkstra(Graph grafo, java.lang.String name, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> prev, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> dist)
      Saves to a file the tree found by Dijkstra.
      int Graph.graphGraph(Graph grapho, int dir, java.lang.String name)
      Function to save the Graph object as a '.gv' file in the location and with the name set by the user.
      int Graph.graphMST(Graph grafo, java.lang.String name, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Edge> mst)
      Saves to file the Minimum Spanning Tree.
      int Graph.graphTree(Graph grafo, java.lang.String name)
      As graphGraph but is saves a Tree.
      boolean Graph.inverseKruskal(Graph grafo, Node s)
      It performs the inverse Kruskal algorithm.
      void Graph.kruskal(Graph grafo)
      It performs the Kruskal's algorithm to the graph.
      boolean Graph.prim(Graph grafo, Node s)
      It performs the Prim's algorithm.
      int Graph.readGraph(Graph grafo)
      Loads into memory a graph from a '.gv' file.
      void Graph.resetNodes(Graph grafo)
      Resets the Node.visited field to false of every single node in the graph.
      void Graph.resetTree(Graph grafo)
      It cleans the treeEdges HashMap.
